answers.answer: Also have your blood sugar tested.  Neuropathy is frequently a result of diabetes.

I DONT KNOW IF THEY STILL HAVE DIAGNOSED YOU OR NOT. BUT MY FEET WERE GOING TO SLEEP AND MY LEGS. I WAS DIAGNOSED WITH AN ABDOMINAL TUMOR THAT STEMMED FROM MY RIGHT OVARY AND WAS SITTING ON MY VENA CAVA AREA. IT WAS 15 POUNDS AND IT HAD MOVED TO THE MID SECTION OF MY STOMACH. SO YOU MAY WANT TO GET THEM TO TEST YOU FOR THAT.

question: why are the bottem of my feet falling asleep even if i stay off of them.
title: the bottems of my feet are falling asleep alot even if i am off them.
